document.full_text: in loretto, kentucky, greg davis of maker's mark carries on an old family tradition of making bourbon with red winter wheat to stimulate taste buds in the front of the mouth.
document.title: u.s. whiskey makers take on tradition with a twist
lines_and_colors: in loretto, kentucky, greg davis of maker's mark carries on an old family tradition of making bourbon with red winter wheat to stimulate taste buds in the front of the mouth.
